data.title: NetSuite ERP Customers List
data.meta_description: Plan systematically and aid your marketing campaigns with Thomson Data’s NetSuite ERP customer list. Get customized list of companies using NetSuite ERP.
data.text:
Oracle’s NetSuite ERP is a cloud-based software-as-a-service (SaaS) solution to help businesses keep up with the dynamic industry requirements. As a unified platform, it provides companies with multiple features like time tracking, scheduling management, asset lifestyle tracking, supply chain management, etc.

The Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) tool is a set of multiple applications to help automate front and back office tasks. It allows the addition of various options like Human Resource (HR) management, payroll and performance management, professional services automation (PSA), etc.

It is currently rated as the world’s #1 cloud ERP system and is used by over 31,000 organizations in 217 different countries. If you want to contact companies that use NetSuite ERP for your business goals, you can contact Thomson Data.

Continue reading to know why working with Thomson Data’s NetSuite ERP customers list can be a game-changing step for your business.

Technographic Data Of Companies That Use NetSuite ERP

NetSuite ERP Customers by Industry

Most industries related to software and IT solutions use NetSuite ERP on a large scale with Computer Software covering more than 38.66%, Information Technology and Services about 14.01%, and Staffing and Recruiting industry having 10.93% of market share.

Computer Software 4,699 IT and Services 1,703 Staffing and Recruiting 1,329 Retail 858 Computer Hardware 1,050 Hospital & Health Care 749 Wholesale 592 Management Consulting 544 Financial Services 338 Marketing and Advertising 290

NetSuite ERP Customers by Country

The United States is the major contributor to global NetSuite ERP usage. So, you can understand how significant a market it is for any relevant marketing campaigns.

United States 10,177 Sweden 47 Canada 536 France 39 Australia 327 India 249

NetSuite ERP Customers by Revenue

About 10.93% of companies with more than $200 million in net revenue integrate NetSuite ERP into their systems. Being able to market to these types of clientele will be highly profitable.

NetSuite ERP Customers by Employee Size

Looking at the company size it can be figured out that 69.09% of companies using NetSuite ERP are having employee count of less than 200,26.18% of companies are having employee count in between 200 to 5,000, and the remaining 4.71% of the companies that use NetSuite ERP have employee count more than 5,000.

Who can Use the NetSuite ERP Customers List?

NetSuite ERP is a highly scalable cloud-based platform to help organizations simplify a huge chunk of their day-to-day activities. It also works well with third-party applications and can be integrated into the existing system.

If you are someone building a NetSuite application, getting in touch with NetSuite ERP customers can benefit you greatly. Additionally, our databases can be utilized by individuals such as:

Entrepreneurs looking to build platforms similar to NetSuite ERP

Researchers wanting to conduct surveys or gather information regarding NetSuite ERP customers

Digital marketers working for organizations catering to the needs of NetSuite ERP users

Business owners offering technical solutions and services that integrate well with NetSuite ERP

If reaching out to companies using NetSuite ERP is a part of your business plan, give Thomson Data a chance! Our unwavering customer support and comprehensive customer records will boost your ROI.

How to use the NetSuite ERP Customers list?

With rapidly changing industry requirements, adapting to the latest technological solutions is the only way to success. One such factor that can highly impact your organization’s sales figures is customer acquisition.

With ever-growing competition, the number of companies providing the same services or products at budget-friendly prices is increasing. As such, it is crucial for you to stand out amongst the competitors and reach your customers directly.

With our updated list of companies using NetSuite ERP, you can easily achieve positive results by:

Delivering business pitches to the respective individual’s active inbox.

Running telemarketing campaigns with human-verified contact lists.

Identifying market gaps and providing your customers with the kind of service they require

Our NetSuite ERP customers list can help you run mobile, email, social media, or direct marketing campaigns. With Thomson Data, you can create a unique identity for yourself amongst the top industry leaders.

Why Choose Us?

Effective marketing takes time, effort, and money. Therefore, running campaigns without identifying the target audience can lead to unwanted results. This is where Thomson Data comes in to help you soar and achieve all your dream business goals.

All you need to do is get your hands on our highly segmented and categorized list of companies that use NetSuite ERP. Doing so will allow you to spread your wings and reach industry professionals who seemed quite unreachable at a point in time.

At Thomson Data, we are all about customer satisfaction. We ensure that by promising you:

Through our expert team’s consistent efforts, Thomson Data has consistently managed a 82% client retention rate. You can also join the bandwagon now and experience the magic of working with accurate information.

We understand your business requirements and ensure to bring the best results forward! With consistently altering industry requirements, you must maintain a stable position amongst your competitors. That’s precisely why you need to partner with Thomson Data now.

Frequently Asked Questions:

According to the company’s official website, over 13,000 organizations in over 217 countries actively use NetSuite ERP to run their business smoothly. Some top names include ASICS, Deloitte Digital, Adtegrity, etc.

You can contact Thomson Data services and solutions to get an updated NetSuite ERP customers list. We provide you with highly segmented and human-verified databases for the best results.

A NetSuite ERP customers list is a database containing in-depth information about all companies using NetSuite ERP. It also includes various segmentation based on geographical regions, industry, job roles, etc.

Companies use NetSuite ERP to automate office tasks like payroll and performance management, professional services automation (PSA), etc. It can further analyze the organization’s financial and operational performance in one digital space.

Some of the top companies that use NetSuite ERP are Cisco, Tableau Software, ChannelAdvisor, Adtegrity, Hertzbach & Company, Zev Technologies, Deloitte Digital, PCS Wireless, DWA Media, Primary Arms, Mitchell International, Inc and many more.
